price: Şübhəsiz ki, Allah göylərin və yerin qeybini biləndir. O, sinələrdə olanları da bilir.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَٰلِمُ غَيۡبِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha ʿālimu ghaybi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi innahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
